text: Robotics Unlimited Inc (http://www.robotics-unlimited.com) | Pensacola, FL We are looking for a mechnical engineer intern and an industrial design engineer intern (both paid) to join us in building awesome robots. U.S. Citizenship or permanent residence required Fun small team/casual environment Amazing beaches Needs enthusiasm in robotics and engineering Needs experience Starts ASAP *More info @ http://reactanceblog.com/robotics-unlimited-jobs
